channel.title: How Can i Stop this?
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Pkp Farming... sick and Tierd of them[/size]
[size=14pt]How can i Stop them?, they login 2 Accounts and kill each other. and it gives them 2 pkps.. Anyway to stop them a TUT or something cos i've Searched the Forums and havent found anything yet.. so please Reply me back with some good information thnk you :][/size]

item.title: How Can i Stop this?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Use an ArrayList to handle your connections to make it so only 1 ip can connect at a time, there is a tutorial in the Tutorial Section.

Read full topic

item.title: How Can i Stop this?

item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

umm, you know the “Stop Multi Login” Tuts n stuff… everytime i try to add to my server i always get errors. so then im leave it and not do it …

item.title: How Can i Stop this?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Just make it to where a client crashes if they open more than one.
